lead_paragraph: New France coach Guy Noves has made a bold choice by picking Sevens stalwart Virimi Vakatawa on the wing in a new-look team to face Italy in their opening Six Nations game at home on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Sevens Stalwart Vakatawa to Start for New-Look France
headline.main: Sevens Stalwart Vakatawa to Start for New-Look France

snippet: New France coach Guy Noves has made a bold choice by picking Sevens stalwart Virimi Vakatawa on the wing in a new-look team to face Italy in their opening Six Nations game at home on Saturday....
